# Howard Gereo

| birth_place    =
| death_date     =
| death_place    =
}}
Howard Gereo (born 18 April 1978) is a Papua New Guinean boxer. He competed in the men's flyweight event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. He also won a gold medal at the 1997 Arafura Games.
